name: Time Rush (apons)
description:
As an experienced driver you have to reach 100KM/H while you keep track of your revs, your current gear and your gearshift speed, and keep an eye on all the obstacles in the track.
The track is randomly generated every game, as well as the obstacles, so... with all this in mind, will you be among the 5 best drivers?

ASSETS USED:

· 3D Vehicle Model: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/arcade-free-racing-car-16...
· 3D Tracks Models: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/roadways/modular-lowpoly-t...

· 3D Obstacles Models: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/props-for-track-environment-lowpo...
